hero.description: Experience the ultimate car care with REX CAR. Professional detailing services that bring out the best in your vehicle.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Professional car care services designed to exceed your expectations

wash.title: Wash

reviews.title: What Our Customers Say
reviews.description: See what our satisfied customers have to say about our premium car care services

story.title: Our Story
story.content: REX CAR was founded with a simple mission: to provide the highest quality car care services with unmatched attention to detail. We believe every vehicle deserves royal treatment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver exceptional car care services that exceed expectations while building lasting relationships with our customers through trust, quality, and reliability.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at REX CAR

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.desc: We never compromise on the quality of our services and products.

customer.title: Customer First
customer.desc: Your satisfaction is our top priority in everything we do.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We continuously adopt the latest techniques and technologies.

team.title: Our Team
team.content1: Our success is built on the expertise and dedication of our professional team. Each member brings years of experience and a passion for automotive excellence.
team.content2: From our skilled technicians to our customer service representatives, everyone at REX CAR is committed to delivering the royal treatment your vehicle deserves.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help with all your car care needs. Reach out to us with any questions or to schedule a service.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Our team is ready to assist you with premium car care services. Reach out through any of these channels.

response.title: Quick Response Time
response.message: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our services.

q1.question: How long does a typical wash service take?
q1.answer: Our standard wash takes about 30 minutes, while premium services like nano ceramic coating can take 2-3 hours.

q2.question: Do I need to book an appointment?
q2.answer: Walk-ins are welcome, but we recommend booking an appointment to guarantee your preferred time slot.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

hero.title: Our Premium Services
hero.subtitle: Professional car care tailored to your needs

wash.title: Premium Wash
wash.description: Complete exterior and interior cleaning service using premium products and professional techniques. Includes hand wash, interior vacuuming, dashboard cleaning, and tire shine.
wash.features: Hand wash, Interior cleaning, Dashboard care, Tire shine

dryclean.title: Professional Dry Clean
dryclean.description: Specialized dry cleaning service for upholstery, carpets, and interior fabrics. Removes stains, odors, and restores the original look of your car's interior.
dryclean.features: Upholstery cleaning, Stain removal, Odor elimination, Fabric protection

polish.title: Paint Polish & Correction
polish.description: Professional paint correction and polishing service that removes scratches, swirl marks, and oxidation to restore your car's original shine and luster.
polish.features: Scratch removal, Swirl mark correction, Paint restoration, Mirror finish

nano.title: Nano Ceramic Coating
nano.description: Advanced nano ceramic coating technology that creates a protective layer on your vehicle's paint. Provides excellent hydrophobic properties, UV protection, and chemical resistance.
nano.features: Hydrophobic coating, UV protection, Chemical resistance, Enhanced gloss

graphene.title: Graphene Coating
graphene.description: Revolutionary graphene coating technology offering superior protection and performance. Provides exceptional durability, heat dissipation, and anti-static properties.
graphene.features: Superior durability, Heat dissipation, Anti-static properties, Self-healing technology
